pages.text: $(li)The Swamp is a flooded Biome that is composed mainly by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/mud_ball)Mud$(/l), Grass, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/clay_ball)Clay$(/l) and Water.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can find a lot of vegetation here like Red Mushrooms, Brown Mushrooms, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sugar_cane)Sugar Cane$(/l), Lilypads, Duckweed, Tall Cattails and Pickerelweed.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/supplementaries/firefly)Fireflies$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/quark/frog)Frogs$(/l), Perchs, $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/pike)Pikes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crocodile)Crocodiles$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Swamp$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
